title: Winnebago
lyrics:
Bright blue down filled sleepin’ bag
Got it rolled up and thrown in back
A pair of jeans and your hiking boots
And that cute little black swimming suit
We can stop on our way outta town
Get what you want and ice it on down

A little get away time is what I need

With just you and me



Why don’t we hook up the ol’ Winnebago

Baby why don’t we go rollin’ down a two lane

Park it right by the lake might catch a little moonlight

Open all the windows

You and me in the middle of nowhere

We’ll build a fire as soon as we get there



There ain’t s’pose to be a cloud in the sky

Gonna be all kinda stars tonight

We’ll pull the lawn chairs up real close

Make a few sparks stirring the coals

With that little trailer we can’t go wrong

Even if a little bit later on

It starts to rain

We’ll go inside and rock away the night



Why don’t we hook up the ol’ Winnebago

Baby why don’t we go rollin’ down a two lane

Park it right by the lake might catch a little moonlight

Open all the windows

You and me in the middle of nowhere

We’ll build a fire as soon as we get there

Why don’t we hook up the ol’ Winnebago

Baby why don’t we go rollin’ down a two lane

Park it right by the lake might catch a little moonlight

Open all the windows

You and me in the middle of nowhere

We’ll build a fire as soon as we get there



We could take off for the weekend

Slow it down and do a little breathing

We’ll be way outta town before they know we’re gone

It’s been way too long how ‘bout it girl come on



Why don’t we hook up the ol’ Winnebago

Baby why don’t we go rollin’ down a two lane

Park it right by the lake might catch a little moonlight

Open all the windows

You and me in the middle of nowhere

We’ll build a fire as soon as we get there

Why don’t we hook up the ol’ Winnebago

Baby why don’t we go rollin’ down a two lane

Park it right by the lake might catch a little moonlight

Open all the windows

You and me in the middle of nowhere

We’ll build a fire as soon as we get there



Why don’t we, why don’t we, why don’t we hook up the ol’ Winnebago

Why don’t we, why don’t we, why don’t we hook up the ol’ Winnebago

Why don’t we, why don’t we, why don’t we hook up the ol’ Winnebago
